title: Mixtape
description: Have you ever had a song take you back to a key moment in your life: maybe you fell in love, broke up with someone, or did something out of character? Music can take people back to their stories of hope, joy, sorrow, and self-discovery. It can make you cry, laugh, angry, sad, happy, and determined. This is a mixtape of one person's journey.
author: T.W. Penn
